name: Ascension (Siddharth Jai Gokulan (siddhusathu20))
description:
The Virtual Physics Simulation Centre presents a new simulation you can try at home for free!

Run through courses in a simulated world where gravitational force is much weaker than on Earth, but you can't jump any time you want! Glide through courses with each one increasing the difficulty!

:: changelog ::
Alpha 1 - Initial demo
Alpha 2 - Added sprinting with Shift
Alpha 2a - Some text changes
Alpha 2b - UI and text changes, game renamed to "Ascension"
